name: AquaPark IO: Fun Race 3D
description:
Jump from wall to wall, climb ropes, swipe to go faster, rotate your phone to jump higher, grab to swing, use bars to keep from falling.

Best 3D racing game with Jumping over obstacles.

Get your Colorful Stickman Jump To touch the wall, climb ropes, swipe to go faster, rotate your phone to jump higher, grab to swing, use bars to keep from falling.

Compete against other players for a real parkour experience.

Never stop running!

Increase your ranking by beating your opponents. You can also customize your character. Skin, clothes, dance and much more

There are dozens of cards and all require different skills.

Never stop running!
